Title: An ASP.NET Color Picker Control based on YUI Color picker
Description: YuiColorPicker is an ASP.NET control that can be used in various ways within a page or control. As the name suggests, it uses the handy YUI Color picker control. The picker control offers features such as animation, inline or modal popup behavior, dynamic loading etc.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
YuiColorPicker is an ASP.NET control that can be used in various ways within a page or control. As the name suggests, it uses the handy YUI Color picker control. The picker control offers features such as animation, inline or modal popup behavior, dynamic loading etc.

See the original CodeProject article:
http://www.codeproject.com/KB/webforms/aspnetyuicolorpicker.aspx
